item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Getting my daily news from a dot matrix printer (180 points | 63 comments)
2. 12 Months of Mandarin (96 points | 14 comments)
3. Show HN: One – A new React framework unifying web, native and local-first (70 points | 17 comments)
4. Show HN: Chebyshev approximation calculator (open source web app) (154 points | 24 comments)
5. Guy does demoscene tricks to ESP32 powered display (2022) (41 points | 3 comments)
6. Gym Class (YC W22) – Hiring First Mobile Game Engineer ( | hide)
7. Experimental web browser optimized for rabbit-holing (416 points | 87 comments)
8. NumPy QuadDType: Quadruple Precision for Everyone (33 points | 28 comments)
9. Why does man print "gimme gimme gimme" at 00:30? (2017) (703 points | 302 comments)
10. Show HN: A tool for creating chord charts on the go (82 points | 23 comments)
11. Show HN: kew – A Terminal Music Player for Linux (77 points | 22 comments)
12. ESP8266 Analog Broadcast Television Interface (44 points | 6 comments)
13. Reverse Engineering and Dismantling Kekz Headphones (135 points | 25 comments)
14. Meta Movie Gen (412 points | 365 comments)
15. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (309 points | 26 comments)
16. Depth Pro: Sharp monocular metric depth in less than a second (73 points | 8 comments)
17. Were RNNs all we needed? (438 points | 218 comments)
18. Computer Scientists Combine Two 'Beautiful' Proof Methods (10 points | discuss)
19. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (1211 points | 353 comments)
20. Self-locking and stiffening deployable tubular structures (21 points | 1 comment)
21. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (196 points | 66 comments)
22. Perfctl: A Stealthy Malware Targeting Linux Servers (109 points | 25 comments)
23. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (883 points | 634 comments)
24. The Silk Road (2023) (54 points | 10 comments)
25. Waymo and Hyundai enter multi-year, strategic partnership (93 points | 38 comments)
26. Why and how we’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (271 points | 163 comments)
27. Holocron is an object storage based leader election library (28 points | 3 comments)
28. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (90 points | 19 comments)
29. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (295 points | 172 comments)
30. HTTrack Website Copier (111 points | 29 comments)
